name: Miss Hap Puzzles It Out
description:
Explore the floating islands as Ms. Happenstance while using your wits to help make your way to the next island. And don't forget to save some stranded people while you're at it! I'm sure they'd appreciate the help.

---

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD/Analog Stick: Move Miss Hap

Space Bar/A Button: Kick boxes and things with Miss Hap's trusty big boot

R/Back/Select: Restarts puzzle

P/Start: Pauses game

Other keys:

F: Toggle fullscreen.  Press ESC to back out of fullscreen.

G: Toggles weather system.  Only has sunny or rainy weather in this build.

---

This game was originally made in 2017 using Construct 2, with plans to deploy builds for PC, Mac, Linux, and Xbox One. Development stopped due to a lack of time to iron out bugs that cropped up, as well as issues with level and puzzle design.

Despite those issues however, I was always really proud of this prototype for the many things I learned along the way while creating it, and I thought it would be best to upload it in some form for the sake of public preservation.

This build featuring the opening area is uploaded as-is, and is dated 4/24/2017.  It says "Debug On" in the corner, but I can't remember how to turn that off as of this writing, there may be a key or combination that does it.

Will update this description with credit for music once I can find the musician's name again.
